name: Echo Memo
tagline: Your 2nd brain on social media
description: Save social media links, let AI read and understand the content—text, images, videos-then you can retrieve them with semantic search when you need (beyond just keywords from text).

name: CloneMyTrips
tagline: AI Travel Buddy
description: The first platform that captures travel inspirations from social media and transforms them into bookable experiences using AI.

name: FreeGuessr.com
tagline: Free GeoGuessr alternative
description: FreeGuessr.com is a free, unlimited online game that challenges players to guess the locations of random places on Earth using Google Street View images. Players can play solo, competitive multiplayer, or with friends in party mode. 100% free, no ads.

name: Ogilvy
tagline: Write like legendary copywriter David Ogilvy
description: Ogilvy doesn't try to do all the writing for you. You're the hero, Ogilvy is your sidekick. Sick of copy-pasting back and forth to ChatGPT? You should be able to go from blank canvas to finished draft without ever leaving an editor. That's why we built Ogilvy.

name: Adobe Premiere Pro 25.2
tagline: Smarter search & generative AI for video
description: Premiere Pro 25.2 adds AI! Use Generative Extend to lengthen clips, AI Media Intelligence to search footage, plus auto caption translation & improved color.

name: Supawald
tagline: Transform your Supabase storage into a powerful CMS
description: Supawald is a headless CMS for Supabase Storage. Simple interface for managing files, images, and content in your Supabase Storage buckets with real-time updates and static site generation support. Set permissions, and connect directly to your Supabase project

name: Draftly
tagline: Turn LinkedIn into your Growth Engine
description: Meet the Draftly Chrome Extension – your LinkedIn growth sidekick. Track impressions, profile visits, and engagement stats. Get smart comment suggestions to boost visibility while staying human. Built for creators, founders, and marketers.

name: Headshotly.ai
tagline: Turn Selfies into Pro Photos, AI Videos & Virtual Try-On
description: Turn your selfies to 100+ studio-quality AI headshots, custom photos & videos. Try virtual outfits, clone any style & bring images to life. Customize images effortlessly with magic prompts - no photographer, no studio needed - just instant, stunning results!

name: Typewriting Helpdesk Agent
tagline: Avoid delays or ghosting—let AI respond your client
description: Reduce email overload and streamline business communication with AI-powered chat responses. Let AI handle common queries using shared documents while you focus on what matters. Step in when needed—stay informed, stay efficient.

name: SaasLink
tagline: Custom LinkedIn Content for Growing Your SaaS Startup
description: AI-powered LinkedIn content generation for SaaS companies. Create engaging posts that convert leads using industry-specific, data-driven content based on your SaaS information.

name: FormCheckerAI
tagline: Your AI coach for flawless workout technique
description: FormCheckerAI: Upload any exercise video and get instant AI feedback on your form. Perfect your technique, prevent injuries, and maximize workout effectiveness with personalized suggestions. Your AI fitness coach in your pocket.

name: IdeaVault
tagline: Create notes, track goals, achieve dreams
description: An effortless way to capture ideas. Instead of letting them slip away, you can store them, focus on them, and create action steps to bring them to life. Track your progress on ideas, projects, goals, and more. An alternative to apple notes.

name: Pebbo: AI baby product scanner
tagline: Scan & Analyze baby products
description: Pebbo: AI Baby Product Scanner – Smart & Safe Parenting A must-have app for parents of babies & toddlers (0-8 years)! 👶✨ How to use? 1. Scan or upload the product back label using Pebbo. 2. Get instant AI analysis. 3. Find out if it’s good for your baby.

name: Supertrend Finder
tagline: Real-time buy/sell signals and advanced risk management tool
description: SupertrendFinder is an all-in-one trading signal platform that helps you make better trading decisions with real-time buy/sell alerts, proven strategies, and advanced risk management. Built for traders of all levels,

name: Maqnet AI
tagline: AI that gives you Super Bowl-quality ad ideas
description: Meet the AI delivering Super Bowl-quality marketing ideas without agency costs. It generates viral campaigns and compelling brand stories that break through noise.

name: Ai Agents
tagline: The place to discover the best AI based agents 🚀
description: AI Agents is your go-to directory to discover, compare, and explore the best AI-powered agents across tasks and categories. Whether you need help writing, selling, or researching—there’s an AI sidekick waiting for you.

name: TypoGram
tagline: 🚀 Boost Your Typing Speed with Typogram.in! ⌨️
description: 🚀 Boost Your Typing Speed with Typogram.in! ⌨️ Looking for a sleek, effective, and engaging way to test and improve your typing speed? Typogram.in is here to elevate your typing skills ✨ Why Choose Typogram? ✔️ Instant and accurate typing speed tests

name: to-do.my - My To-Do Local Storage App
tagline: Free - Advanced To-Do List Task Management Local Storage App
description: Boost your productivity with My To-Do's intelligent task management, Pomodoro timer, and ambient sounds. Organize tasks, set priorities, and stay focused.

name: Writco — Write, Read, Earn Rewards
tagline: Social Literary App for Connecting Readers, Writers Globally
description: Writco – The Ultimate Literary Social Network App for writing, reading, and earning! Multilingual platform that connects writers and readers globally. Discover, write, share, and self-publish stories, poems, novels, monetize content, and earn rewards.

name: ReviewFast
tagline: Boost sales with instant 5-star reviews — Social Proofs
description: With ReviewFast, collecting and showcasing 5-star testimonials happens in seconds ✅ Instantly request reviews in one click - WhatsApp, QR code, email ✅ Display real Social Proofs to boost conversions ✅ Own all your testimonials and embed them anywhere
